title.narrative: 7.2. SOCIAL PROTECTION

description.narrative: Capacity of Government and development partners to implement development-orientated social protection programming is strengthened through a strategic programme of research, advocacy, policy support, and targeted capacity building., which contributes to Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF, partner and Government capacity is strengthened to implement equity focused and evidence based programmes informed by socio- cultural dynamics.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF INTERIOR LOCAL GOVERNMENT AND RECONCILIATION SOUTHWEST STATE OF SOMALIA

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Capacity of Government and development partners to implement development-orientated social protection programming is strengthenedthrough a strategic programme of research, advocacy, policy support, and targeted capacity building.

description.narrative: Social protection advocacy has continued with Government in Central South Somalia and Somaliland. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:08/01/2018

title.narrative: Number of government counterparts provided with training to improve understanding of design and implementation of SP programmes.

actual.value: 2017:No training undertaken in Somaliland in 2017 due to funding constraints for further actions (desire to manage expectations of government counterparts) and regular change of counterparts

title.narrative: Government, donors and UN agencies recognise the role of social protection in creating resilience to shocks.

target.value: 2017:Social protection activities fully recognised, including in SL NDP

actual.value: 2017:Somaliland draft NDP includes an SP section.

title.narrative: Evidence is built for the impact of long-term, resilience-focused social protection programmes.
Existence of valid national social protection strategy and/or policy
